channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for FL
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for FL

item.title: Report X-2023080484
item.description:
Report X-2023080484

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-24T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-26
  • City: OCALA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found wet. Upon inspection found 1 bottle of Zee Hand-E-San alcohol antiseptic 80% 1-gallon had loose lid resulted to leakage. Package had flammable liquid diamond but no OP-900 on outer box. Shipping label was a normal label, not the hazmat approved shipping label. DescribePack: Bottle had loose lid resulted to leakage. Package had flammable liquid diamond but doesn't have the OP-900 or hazmat certificate to go with package. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in hazmat bag lined tote.

item.title: Report E-2023080144
item.description:
Report E-2023080144

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-24T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-07
  • City: TAMPA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted during transit and that one of the metal 55 gallon drum of paint (un1263) had been damaged by a sharp object and had released 1 ounce of product. The warehouse crew was able to contain and cleanup the release. so no contractors were dispatched.

item.title: Report X-2023080304
item.description:
Report X-2023080304

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-24T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-22
  • City: ORLANDO
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Unprocessed hazamat from ASTE. The box was found wet in the load area and moved to the hazmat cage for reports. DescribePack: The caps came off of 2 of the jugs in the box, causing contents to leak out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The box was placed into a hazbag lined tote.

item.title: Report X-2023070076
item.description:
Report X-2023070076

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-24T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-16
  • City: MIAMI
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: package was observed to be warm to the touch. upon inspection discovered to contain multiple inner packagings with multiple Lithium Ion Batteries/Undeclared DG. Outer package has no DG markings or labels. One battery had slight discharge. no smoke or visible signs of fire. shipment secured in salvage drum pending FAA inspection.
